Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that the man was sentenced to death in Syria for preaching the gospel, when in reality the image is of an Iranian man who was hanged for murder.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it only provides a photo and a statement without any additional evidence or sources.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the man in the photo was sentenced to death for preaching the gospel, without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the man in the photo was actually convicted of murdering an Iranian judge.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim could have an alternative explanation that the person sharing it misunderstood or misinterpreted the image and its context.
